home.name: I'm Lenildo Luan
home.intro: Multidisciplinary software developer based in João Pessoa, Brazil, where I build solutions through code and empower professionals to do the same while striving to become a better human being, 1% at a time.

about.title: A little more about me
about.metaDescription: I'm Lenildo Luan. I live in João Pessoa, where I turn ideas into reality through technology.
about.paragraph1: For as long as I can remember, I've been driven by curiosity and creativity. I always wanted to understand how things work and loved creating something new. These characteristics made me fall in love with computers and technology — tools that helped me better understand the world and gave me the power to create my own.
about.paragraph2: I grew up in João Pessoa, a capital in Northeast Brazil, without many financial resources. But I didn't let that stop me. I started learning on my own: reading books, watching videos, and experimenting with what I had at hand. Over time, I went deeper, and the more I learned, the more excited I became — it was like having superpowers!
about.paragraph3: During college, I fully immersed myself in the field, getting involved in various projects: volunteer work, academic research, entrepreneurship, and personal projects. I wanted to learn about everything and got involved wherever possible. That's how I discovered my true passion: solving problems through technology.
about.paragraph4: Today I use my curiosity and creativity to solve real people's problems through technology. I'm always learning and challenging myself to evolve, both as a professional and as a person. I believe technology can transform the world, and I want to be part of that transformation.
